short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly check and share your next 5 days availability. Ideal for busy professionals or remote teams to simplify calendar scheduling.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly share your next 5 business days of availability with just a few clicks. This extension integrates seamlessly with your calendar, providing a snapshot of your schedule to help you coordinate meetings efficiently. Perfect for professionals who need to communicate their availability quickly and clearly.

Features:

Displays your next 5 business days of availability.
Easy-to-read interface showing available time slots.
Integrates with your calendar for real-time updates.
One-click copy feature to share your schedule instantly.
Save time and streamline your scheduling process with "Calendar: Next 5 Days Availability.
